lccp_segmentation Class Reference

Class to detect table top objects in a cluttered scene segmenting the point cloud. Algorithm is based on http://docs.pointclouds.org/trunk/classpcl_1_1_l_c_c_p_segmentation.html. More...

#include <segmentation.h>

Detailed Description

Class to detect table top objects in a cluttered scene segmenting the point cloud. Algorithm is based on http://docs.pointclouds.org/trunk/classpcl_1_1_l_c_c_p_segmentation.html.

)
protected

detectObjectsOnTable detects objects on table

Parameters
cloudinput cloud
zminminimum distance perpendicular to table(meters)
zmaxmaximum distance perpendicular to table(meters)
objectIndicesindices of the points belonging to the objects
filter_input_cloudbool to filter the input cloud
